basics.name: Shailesh
basics.label: Undergraduate Student
basics.summary: A highly motivated student with a passion for robotics and artificial intelligence.

work Experience.name: Undergraduate Research Internship
work Experience.summary: Working on using state-of-the-art foundation models (VLMs & LLMs) to solve robotic manipulation problems.
highlights: Working on precise manipulation in indoor environments relying on robot vision.

work Experience.name: ERC Lab, National Taiwan Normal University
work Experience.summary: Worked on collaborative control of upper & lower body of a wheeled humanoid robot using multi-agent reinforcement learning.
highlights: Trained robust policy to maneuver and jump in the Isaac Gym environment.
Trained collaborative policies for upper and lower body, using MAPPO, IPPO & Dual-A2C.
The policy could handle manipulation tasks by the upper body while the lower body handled balancing and maneuvering.

work Experience.name: Stochastic Robotics Lab, Indian Institute of Science (IISc, Bangalore)
work Experience.summary: Worked on a locomotion controller that can execute diverse gaits with variable footswing, posture, and speed.
highlights: Trained a single policy that can execute four different gaits.
The robot was trained using teacher-student curriculum learning.
Developed a ROS package for the same robot.
Transferred the RL policy into the ROS (Gazebo) environment.

work Experience.name: TEXMiN (Technology Innovation Hub)
work Experience.summary: Worked on the development of an in-house Quadrupedal Robot for Mining Application.
highlights: Developed a ROS-based framework for the in-house developed Quadrupedal Robot.
Derived the kinematics and dynamics for the robot.
Worked on a locomotion controller using ZMP stabilization (V1) and a reinforcement learning-based control policy (V2).
Performed hardware testing of the locomotion controller.

education.institution: Indian Institute of Technology (IIT ISM), Dhanbad

awards.title: 1st Position, Robofest Gujarat 3.0 2023
awards.summary: India's Biggest Robotics Competition, prize money $12,000

awards.title: 3rd Position, Robowars (BattleBots) at Concetto 2022
awards.summary: Annual Tech Fest of IIT Dhanbad

projects.name: Inter IIT Tech Meet 11.0 - Drona Aviation Problem Statement
projects.summary: Worked on accurate pose estimation of drones using ArUco Tag and a single monocular camera.
highlights: Developed a system to hover a drone at a particular height using ArUco Tag.
Implemented a method to move the drone in a rectangular motion (1 x 2 meter) and make a second drone follow the first drone.

projects.name: Omni-Wheel Self Balancing Bike
projects.summary: Solved the mathematical model and implemented LQR control for an omni-wheel self-balancing bike.
highlights: Developed the hardware and implemented the LQR control on the robot.

projects.name: Two-Wheeled Self Balancing Robot
projects.summary: Developed a custom cascaded PID-based controller for a two-wheeled self-balancing robot.
highlights: Simulated the robot in Gazebo (using cascaded PID controller) and Simulink (with LQR controller).
Designed and built a two-wheeled robot in hardware from scratch.
